summary: A follower derivation of my Argonian Brute character, Loh-Rel.
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Loh-Rel, the Argonian Brute[/size][/color][/u]

[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]IMPORTANT[/color]
[/b][/size][size=2]This character uses the head mesh from VectorPlexus "[i][url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/index.php?topic=8353.0]Brutish Argonian Male[/url]"[/i]Â mod.
The mesh has been included in the download, but if you want the edited voice files that make him sound bulkier, you'll need to download the package from the Optional Files section of his mod.[/size]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=3]A quick and simple follower mod that I made for shits and giggles.
Planning to give him custom armor and accessories, but for now he'll be rocking Banded Iron and a Steel Battleaxe.

He can be found working at Warmaiden's in Whiterun.

Mods used:
[/size][size=1][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52241/?]Brutish Argonian Male[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=268991411]Radioreggae's Hair Workshop for Argonian[/url][/size]

[size=3]Mods used in screenshots (but not included in the download):[/size]
[size=1][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29775/?]Kalicola's Enhanced Graphics ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42043/?]FAR - Forgotten Argonian Roots[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12974/?]Perfect Whiterun[/url][/size]
author: Hammerbane
